name: Samurai Defender
description:
Samurai Defender is a simple defense
type action game set in the Warring
States period of Japan.

Defend the castle from approaching
enemies!

Tap on an enemy soldier to aim at
them. Your bowmen will take care of
the rest.

Enemies will move towards your
castle gate, so take aim and stop
them from getting too close!

Use the coins you acquire to learn
new schemes!

Use the schemes you learned to
defeat lots of enemies!

Defend your castle more easily by
leveling up your bowman and schemes,

and enjoy the exhilaration of
repelling waves of enemy attacks!
